function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of collaboration between agriculture and health sectors for malaria control","Impact":"Increased risk of malaria outbreaks due to lack of coordinated efforts","Mitigation":"Establish collaborative initiatives between agriculture and health sectors for integrated malaria control","Technologies":"Collaborative platforms, data sharing technologies, remote monitoring tools","People":"Community members, healthcare workers, agricultural workers","Owner":"Government health agencies, agricultural institutions"},{"Description":"Difficulty in long-term planning for climate change impact on health in resource-limited settings","Impact":"Lack of preparedness for future health threats from climate change","Mitigation":"Develop adaptation strategies tailored to local resource-limited settings, provide education on climate change health impacts","Technologies":"Climate modeling tools, educational resources, community engagement platforms","People":"Policymakers, community members in resource-limited settings","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Incentivizing effective adaptation policies in the absence of visible threats","Impact":"Lack of motivation to implement adaptation policies without immediate benefits","Mitigation":"Provide incentives for long-term adaptation, communicate long-term benefits of adaptation, align policies with current priorities","Technologies":"Incentive tracking systems, communication tools, policy alignment frameworks","People":"Policymakers, community leaders, decision-makers","Owner":"Government agencies, advocacy groups"}]}
